channel.title: Apache ANT on Matt Snider
channel.description: Recent content in Apache ANT on Matt Snider

item.title: Ceridian Dayforce
item.description: Led the development of a new internal toolset for implementation consultants to accelerate the implementation cycle, which was later made into a dedicated development team The tools were built using C# and WPF as well as Java and JavaFX and included a Windows installer and updater
